allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-site inputs and update to publish-quartz v0.3.11

Add home, title, favorites inputs to reusable workflow and pass
them through to the publish-quartz action for multi-site builds.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Unified two-site build with GitHub Environments

Build both cyber.page and cv.land from this single repo using
separate GitHub Environments for secrets. Both jobs run in parallel.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
